name: polyflow-ai-platform
description: AI-Powered Cross-Chain Development Platform for Polkadot

scripts.setup: npm run setup:deps && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:deps: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../ai-engine && npm install && cd ../xc-orchestrator && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ai-engine" "npm run dev:xcm"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:ai-engine && npm run build:xcm
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:ai-engine && npm run test:xcm
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:ai-engine && npm run lint:xcm
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:ai-engine && npm run typecheck:xcm
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:docker
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules ai-engine/node_modules xc-orchestrator/node_modules
scripts.clean:docker: docker system prune -af && docker volume prune -f
scripts.hackathon:package: npm run build && npm run test && ./scripts/package-hackathon.sh
scripts.security:audit: npm audit --audit-level high && npm run security:scan

author: PolyFlow AI Team
